name: Adrenal Reaction
positive_effects: Increased damage based on Kill Streak (Max 10)

name: Carnivore
positive_effects: Eating meat provides double hunger satisfaction, HP restoration, and consumable buffs, with no disease chance and no rads taken
negative_effects: Eating vegetable-based food does not satisfy hunger, restore HP, or apply buffs

name: Chameleon
positive_effects: The player character gains invisibility while unarmored, stationary, and having a weapon drawn but not attacking
negative_effects: None beyond the requirements for the perk's positive effects

name: Eagle Eyes
positive_effects: +50% critical damage and +4 Perception Positive effects (with Strange in Numbers) +75% critical damage and +5 Perception

name: Egg Head
negative_effects: 3 Strength and Endurance With the Class Freak perk at max rank, this mutation's downsides will show as "STR >-1 END >-1" in the Pip-Boy, as 75% of 3 is not an integer

name: Electrically Charged
positive_effects: Chance to shock melee attackers upon being hit
negative_effects: Shock deals energy damage to player character

name: Grounded
negative_effects: 50% Energy weapon damage Grounded reduces all damage dealt by energy weapons by 50%

name: Healing Factor
positive_effects: Health regeneration +3% per second (only works when not in combat)
negative_effects: Chem effects -55% (including Stimpaks, Radaway, and Rad-X) The health regeneration effect functions regardless of hunger level, despite the mutation

name: Herbivore
positive_effects: Consuming fruit, herb or vegetable-based food/drink provides double the hunger/thirst satisfaction, HP restoration and consumable buffs, with no disease chance and no rads taken
negative_effects: Eating meat-based food does not satisfy

name: Herd Mentality
positive_effects: +2 to all SPECIAL stats when grouped
negative_effects: 2 to all SPECIAL stats when solo

name: Plague Walker
positive_effects: Poison aura scaling with the number of acquired diseases (4 max)

name: Speed Demon
negative_effects: Increased Hunger and Thirst accumulation by 50% while moving

name: Talons
positive_effects: Unarmed attacks deal 25% more damage and amplifies bleeding attacks

name: Twisted Muscles
positive_effects: • Standard: +25% melee, unarmed and bashing damage and +20% chance to cripple enemy limbs

name: Unstable Isotope
positive_effects: 10% chance to release a radiation blast when struck in melee
negative_effects: The radiation blast irradiates the player character
